snippet: At a service for the airport security official who was killed in a shooting in Los Angeles, Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. promised to work to “prevent tragedies like this from happening.”
lead_paragraph: At a service for the airport security official who was killed in a shooting in Los Angeles, Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. promised to work to “prevent tragedies like this from happening.”

headline.main: Danger to T.S.A. Officials Hovers Over Memorial Service
